title: #92Noon! Guerin/Bercich/Gleeman
description: -- PA tries to find peace in the chaos that is pigskin in the purge. Wild GM Bill Guerin joins to talk Wild prospects in world juniors and the status of the team, Pete Bercich talks all things Vikings as well as who should be sitting in Detroit, and Aaron Gleeman talks Twins offseason and early Wolves impressions.
